description:
This is fixed on master with commit 8c98b601f2db1f078d5f42ab94043d9939608f73 but is useless on stable/icehouse, here is an example snip from a stable/icehouse tempest run of what this looks like in the n-cpu log:

2014-08-14 16:18:53.311 473 DEBUG nova.virt.driver [-] Emitting event  emit_event /opt/stack/new/nova/nova/virt/driver.py:1207

It would be really nice to use that information in trying to debug what's causing all of these hits for InstanceInfoCacheNotFound stack traces:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

We should backport that repr fix to stable/icehouse for serviceability purposes.
title: nova.virt.driver 'Emitting event' log message in stable/icehouse doesn't show anything

comments.content:
This is fixed on master with commit 8c98b601f2db1f078d5f42ab94043d9939608f73 but is useless on stable/icehouse, and it would be really nice to use that information in trying to debug what's causing all of these hits for InstanceInfoCacheNotFound stack traces:

http://logstash.openstack.org/#

We should backport that repr fix to stable/icehouse for serviceability purposes.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: We'd need to also backport commit 79c8bee9be7b6cf4e9fd3365a162f93a2b014bb5 as a dependency.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content: Ah bug 1304968 is related and there is a backport for that already.

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/114351
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=1b7ab22f8b3def1af543539fc7a59be8d36d7116
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    stable/icehouse

commit 1b7ab22f8b3def1af543539fc7a59be8d36d7116
Author: Sean Dague <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 30 08:08:27 2014 -0400

    make lifecycle event logs more clear
    
    Instead of logging integers in a cryptic way, log the human
    readable strings for VM event state transitions. Also use the
    existing instance_uuid port of the logger instead of putting that
    separately into our log message.
    
    Partial-Bug: #1357063
    
    Change-Id: I96c39ad4494aa06a8dd5bd942c669a16836a8b9c
    (cherry picked from commit 79c8bee9be7b6cf4e9fd3365a162f93a2b014bb5)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/114352
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=3c34e378354e3fde6659e49e3f9cc6bbb9e42634
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    stable/icehouse

commit 3c34e378354e3fde6659e49e3f9cc6bbb9e42634
Author: Sean Dague <email address hidden>
Date:   Mon Jun 30 16:00:30 2014 -0400

    add repr for event objects
    
    When an event object gets dumped in a stack trace, because there
    is no __repr__ of it, we don't get any details about what it was.
    Add a __repr__ to all the event objects so that we can get this
    information on a fail.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1357063
    
    Change-Id: I9a62a4348871b748c53b7354ad1b821fe987127d
    (cherry picked from commit 8c98b601f2db1f078d5f42ab94043d9939608f73)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
